SELECT CART_NUM , CART_CNT , TOTAL_PRICE , CART_DATE , TITLE , PRICE , C.BOOK_NUM , IS_MAIN , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME FROM shop_cart C INNER JOIN book B
ON C.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM INNER JOIN BOOK_IMG I ON C.BOOK_NUM = I.BOOK_NUM WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' ORDER BY CART_DATE DESC
